channel.title: Constant Méheut on ECTHRwatch
channel.description: Recent content in Constant Méheut on ECTHRwatch

item.title: Reply from Constant Méheut, journalist for The New York Times
item.description: From: constant.meheut@nytimes.com Subject: New York Times Date received: 2022-05-31 at 18:24 Beijing time To: [Victim/key witness/whistleblower’s name, redacted for privacy] (Visit X-v-France.com for more information on who I am.) Note: the email has been redacted for privacy. Also, READ THIS: https://www.tojournalists.com/open-letters/explanations-sent-to-constant-meheut-may-25-2022/ Dear Mr. [NAME OF THE WHISTLE-BLOWER, REDACTED FOR PRIVACY], Thank you very much for your emails. To be honest, I have to admit it’s a little bit difficult to follow and I am not sure I understand, yet, the link between everything you told me so far.
